theme: dahar vidya - ब्रह्म(आकाश) से नाम रूप आदि प्रकाशित होते हैं - आकाशो वै नाम नामरूपयोर्निर्वहिता ते यदन्तरा तद्ब्रह्म(छान्दो. ८-१४-१)

wisdomlib.meaning: Also because of the well-known meaning (of Akasa as Brahman the ‘small Akasa’ is Brahman)
wisdomlib.shankara-comm: Akasa is the revealer of all names and forms” (Chh. 8. 14. 1); “All these beings take their rise from Akasa alone” (Chh. 1. 9. 1). In all these passages ‘Akasa’ stands for Brahman

terms.Explanation: In this verse, the word \"प: known or famous scripture which is being referred to in the following verses. It indicates that the scriptures being discussed are widely recognized and accepted as authoritative sources of knowledge. This verse sets the context for further discussion and analysis of these well-known scriptures and their teachings.
